mdata.condensed:
Full Smart Entry
Reverse camera
Automatic air conditioning
Head up display
Toyota Touch & Go Plus
mdata.expanded:
15" alloy wheels
Body-coloured, electric, heated and retractable door mirrors
LED headlamps with washers
LED daytime running lights
Front fog lamps
Front and rear electric windows
Rain sensing wipers
Minowa cloth seat trim with leather bolsters
Touch Tracer controls
Bluetooth connectivity
Cruise control
mdata.xhtml:
The Prius Plug-in Hybrid includes features such as:

Toyota Touch & Go Plus Multimedia and Navigation System with 8 JBL Speakers, Bluetooth and Reversing Camera
Full Smart Entry & Start System
Heated Front Seats
Leather Steering Wheel
Rain-sensing Wipers
Dual Zone Automatic A/C

derivatives.description: Plug-in 1.8 VVT-i Hybrid Privacy Style Leather

mdata.expanded: A stylish addition to Prius Plug-in providing UV protection, heat reduction and added safety to the three rear windows.
Coming 2014
Setanta black leather upholstery adds even more comfort and style to your Prius Plug-in.

derivatives.description: Plug-in 1.8 VVT-i Hybrid Privacy Protection Style Leather

options.options: Privacy Glass, Protection Pack, Style Pack, Leather

mdata.expanded: A stylish addition to Prius Plug-in providing UV protection, heat reduction and added safety to the three rear windows.
Protect your Prius Plug-in with rear parking sensors and a boot liner, both included when the protection pack is selected.
Coming 2014
Setanta black leather upholstery adds even more comfort and style to your Prius Plug-in.
